Site Rebuild

After neglecting my website for 18 months I’ve decided to rebuild it. If you’re looking for old content, you can find in the Wayback Machine - the data visualizations no longer work but the gist is there.

I’ve decided to go with a simple Jekyll theme called Heather and made a few tweaks to the front page, font, and footer.

30 June 2017
